com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Class HMOperationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.OperationResult
      • com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.HMOperationResult

  • public class HMOperationResult
extends OperationResult

    Defines a result that is returned from the following user exit IHMUserOperationPlugin.

    If user exit modifies some HM graph objects it is supposed to return HMOperationResult containing all modified entities and relationships. When execution of user exit is complete BDD refreshes all modified HM relationships and entities on UI canvas.

    • Field Summary

      • HMOperationResult

        public HMOperationResult(Collection<BDDHMEntity> changedEntities,
                         Collection<BDDHMRelationship> changedRelationships)
        Constructs a result containing HM relationships and entities modified by this user exit. BDD refreshes these objects on UI canvas when user exit completes execution.
        Parameters:
        changedEntities - collection of entities modified by this user exit.
        changedRelationships - collection of relationships.
